name: Cashnado!
description: The idea in Cashnado is to collect as much cash as you can in the time you're given, using your Vive controllers to grab the cash and bring it towards your "money bag". There are some powerups for you to discover, as well. [Here is a screenshot](https://www.dropbox.com/s/9y6bi338tyq5440/screenshot_highQual_large.png?dl=0).
